text: Merry Christmas! I've been with the family all day, we're about to eat some awesome homemade food. Gotta love it. I hope you're are all having a good time with your family, your friends or... your video games! I got some sweet presents, including a PS3 (with Uncharted 1&2), so I'll finally be able to play some of those exclusives I didn't want to miss. Funny I got this too since I didn't make any wishlist this year.
